uid.description: Unique identifier of the staffLayout object

staff_uid.description: Unique identifier of the staff member

css_class.description: the css class of the layout, determines the layout of the dashboard based on the class

layout.description: a json object that represents the layout of the dashboard for the staff member

created_at.description: The time the call was created

updated_at.description: The time the call was last updated

description: The layout of the dashboard for a staff member, includes only the widgets that the staff member has access to
